1471620.name: Bryant's Freeski
1471620.description:
Drop in and rediscover the 90's classic Ski Free, reimagined in Unreal Engine

Ski down the mountain as Bryant avoiding obstacles, performing tricks, picking up tins, and of course avoiding the Yeti.
Place on the leaderboard each month for a chance to win some sick prizes!

Features

  • Fast paced slopestyle game
  • Perfect for all ages!
  • Doge the dog, Dodge the snowboarder. But most importantly dodge the Yeti!
  • Ski through the flags, perform tricks, and pick up tins to earn points.
  • The longer you ski, the greater your score!
1471620.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
